{{Lang|'''Yiyan Temple'''|zh=倚岩殿|zh_rm=Yǐyán-diàn|zh_tl=Rock Reliant Temple}} is a location in [[Liyue Harbor]], dedicated to the Geo Archon, [[Morax]]. It is located near the Yuehai Pavilion, at [[Yujing Terrace]]. It overlooks most of Liyue Harbor. This is where the Rite of Descension used to take place. Sometimes, worshippers of the Geo Archon come here to offer incense and prayers to the Geo Archon.
